# ChangeLog

## v5.11.2

- fix: add typing for the the context param of the `t` 
  function--`t(_,_,_, context)`--as `I18nContext.`

## v5.11.1

Correct `.npmignore`.

## v5.11.0

* Added support for the `#Tooling` section and first class support for bundle loading in `vitest`.

## v5.6.0
* feat: allow nested preloads
* fix: optimize case where bundle is preloaded but callback passed
* chore: split node_module preloads into a separate part of the docs
* feat: allow nested preloads

## v5.5.1
* Fix: i18n-ebay fails in browser due to use of `const`. https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3709

## v5.5.0
* Typescript support for i18n-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3638

## v5.4.3
* Fixed: Incorrect resolution for list with targets, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3603

## v5.4.1
* Fix: i18n-ebay@^5 caches content with request context that causes OOM, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3080

## v5.4.0
* Added: support attribute to disable escaping of text placeholders, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3031

## v5.2.0
* Added context API to pass locality without req object.

## v5.1.4
* Platform version keeper: Upgrading module dependencies

## v5.2.3
* Change: made escape attribute optional for backwards compatibility

## v5.2.2
* Added: relaive and absolute attributes for link placeholder

## v5.2.1
* Added: URL parameters passes into dynamic placeholder, should not be escaped in html tags
## v5.2.0
* Implemented: URL parameters passes into dynamic placeholder, should not be escaped, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2840

## v5.1.2
* Fixed: edge-case when accept-language has en-US which should fall back to en, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/XOAPP-39935

## v5.1.1
* Fixed: edge cases for parser when single quotes or complex name used in tags

## v5.1.0
* Fixed: iOS 6.1: LLT-41242 SAV DLP launch 2 - Native - Feature follows language of the Site and not the device, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2616

## v5.0.9
* Remove babelrc from publishing

## v5.0.8
* Allow fomratting currency in money placeholder with different locality - contributed by Prashant Ashok
* Avoid caching by locality for money and dat formatting

## v5.0.7
* Picked up latest fixes and changes from locale-formatter-ebay

## v5.0.6
* Fixed: timeZone is not detected when read from req.locality

## v5.0.5
* Removed .nvmrc file

## v5.0.4
* Should handle empty tag attributes, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1959

## v5.0.3
* JS error thrown at Object.assign in unsupported browsers (IE), https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1920
    * provided a simple polyfill in case Object.assign is not available

## v5.0.2
* Allow unclosed html tags, like image, br: https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1936

## v5.0.1
* Fixed: NPE issue when resolving from undefined value, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1627

## v5.0.0
* Added support for `@target` in `.properties` to include COUNTRYREGION (4 chars) for BEFR, BENL, CAFR etc.

## v4.0.3
* Add support for Lasso v3 and test against both Lasso v3 and Lasso v2

## v4.0.2
* Use marko-context-ebay to get the request from the marko out context

## v4.0.1
* When user from non-geo country vist US site content with target override is served instead of en-US content

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.3.18
* Fixed: content list should stay a list after externalization to the browser side, https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/i18n-ebay/issues/27

## v0.3.17
* Fixes #18 - Provide ability to set locale for testing purposes

## v0.3.16
* Upgraded to Marko 2.x
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.3.15
* Fixed: Set to close transaction when the bundle is not found.

## v0.3.14

## v0.3.13
* Fixed: should not cache request context in i18n.use(module) from first request that accessed content this way.

## v0.3.12
* Added support to load localized content from within the module
* [More details](https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/i18n-ebay/blob/master/README.md)
